title: Filter Popup
behaviorsList: The maximum number of fields that can be shown in the filter popup is 8.
If only switches or check-boxes are used, it can support up to 16 fields.
When a filter is applied, the filter button will turn orange (the primary color) to indicate that a filter is active.
Questions cannot be supported in the filter popup. Use a filter modal instead.
If only one filter is used, display it directly in the UI without a popup. Use a popup if there are two or more filters.
Users can set a filter as default by clicking the bookmark icon, which will save the selected filter and indicate it in orange (the primary color).
